mapper.select: select a.id AS id, a.shop_id AS shopId, a.name AS freeMealName, a.start_time AS startTime, a.end_time AS endTime, a.award_time AS awardTime, a.status AS status, a.real_join_no AS realJoinNo, a.award_no AS awardNo, b.name AS shopName, b.is_chain AS isChain, b.cate AS cate from free_meal_config a left join shop b on a.shop_id = b.id order by field( a.status,'NEW','START_JOIN','END_JOIN','START_LOTTERY','END_LOTTERY','OFF') ,a.shop_id
select COUNT(*) from free_meal_config a left join shop b on a.shop_id = b.id
select count(*) from free_meal_user where config_id = #{0} and is_award = '1'
select count(*) from free_meal_award where config_id = #{0}

select status AS status, count(status) AS count from user_stock where product_id = (select b.product_id from free_meal_award a left join coupon b on a.coupon_id = b.id where a.config_id = #{0}) and type = 'FREE_MEAL' group by status
